title: Creative Language Learning Strategy Workshop: Competency Enhancement through Experiential Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Program design combining creative learning strategies and experiential learning for language education targeting corporate leaders and managers

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to creatively reconstruct linguistic expressions through peer feedback

After a 1-week intensive course, learners will role-play ≥3 business scenarios (negotiation, presentation, customer consultation) and apply practical business language strategies achieving an average score of ≥4 out of 5 in peer evaluations and instructor feedback.

Learners will analyze ≥3 language barrier cases from real corporate environments through team projects (4-person teams) in a 1-week intensive course, complete a 10-minute presentation proposing solutions, and meet ≥80% of the 5-item evaluation rubric.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
